## ExtractSchemaOptions type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ExtractSchemaOptions = {
    schemas?: string[];
    typeFilter?: (pgType: PgType) => boolean;
    resolveViews?: boolean;
    onProgressStart?: (total: number) => void;
    onProgress?: () => void;
    onProgressEnd?: () => void;
};
```
